name: rlack
description: A complete Slack clone with web and macOS applications

scripts.install:packages: cd packages/backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../desktop && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:desktop"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web && npm run build:desktop
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
